text: America's Courtyard is an outdoor stone sculpture by husband and wife Brazilian artists Ary Perez and Denise Milan, installed outside Chicago's Adler Planetarium, in the U.S. state of Illinois. File:Chicago, June 2015 - 075.jpg|Plaque for the sculpture ==See also== * List of public art in Chicago ==References== Category:Outdoor sculptures in Chicago Category:Stone sculptures in Illinois Category:Works by Brazilian people
title: America's Courtyard
